description:
Arajin dreams of a sweet high school life at a new school, where the Minato Kai and Siguma Squad gangs fight to be on "top." Arajin meets the charming Mahoro, his childhood friend Matakara, and then a legendary djinn Senya, and his fate begins to change.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gattai!? Koi Suru Fortune Bang Bang Jii!
L`union ! L`horoscope amoureux du poulet bang bang !
Merge?! Fall in Love with Fortune Bang Bang Chicken!
合体!? 恋するフォーチュンバンバンジー!
